readable.title: 2853407781_c9fea8eef4
readable.content: A man in a brown jacket and beige cap is drinking from a Styrofoam cup . A man in a jacket and cap is crouching down and drinking from a cup . A man in a leather jacket drinking coffee . A man is crouched down next to a building sipping a drink . A man wearing a coat is leaned against wall drinking from a white cup .
